definition: senior/of a senior generation/to honor/to respect/honorific/classifier for cannons and statues/ancient wine vessel

sentences.english: One legend features the Jade Emperor, also known as the Emperor of Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 有一個傳說的主角是玉皇大帝，又稱元始天尊。

sentences.english: Zhang Qishan according to the map to move forward, again meet the statue of Buddha old mother.
sentences.chinese: 張啓山按照地圖繼續前行，再次遇到天尊老母的雕像。

sentences.english: Now I'm gazing upon eleven warriors who are the Covenant of Primus!
sentences.chinese: 不過現在，天尊的這十一個聖鬥士就站在我的眼前。

definition: time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
honored sir (a person of higher status or seniority, or a Buddhist monk)
Nirvana (in Buddhist scripture)/Lord Brahma (the Hindu Creator)
Shengzu, temple name of the second Qing emperor, known as the Kangxi Emperor (1654-1722)/cf. 康熙[Kang1 xi1]
to greet and usher in (guests, newcomers etc)/(Buddhism) to receive into the Pure Land
